channel.title: Changing Stat Bonuses. (Nevermind, starting on a new source)
channel.description: Well, on the server I'm coding, (A Cleaned Source, forgot the name. Not Jukk's or any of them!) My stat bonus is all 120+ In Attack Bonus, Defence Bonus, Prayer bonus and Strength bonus. I've checked my Player.java, Client.java, Server.java, and PlayerHandler.java and can't find it. But! I did find this [code=c]public int playerBonus[] = new int[12];[/code] I changed the 12 to a 0. But it didn't do anything, I even compiled and ran it again. Still, nothing. :( Any ideas?

item.title: Changing Stat Bonuses. (Nevermind, starting on a new source)
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

No, your not understanding. It’s when I have NOTHING equipped. When you start, you have nothing, (at the moment anyway.) I tried changing that 12 to 0 but it doesn’t do anything. In your bonuses, you still have 120. I just checked item.cfg too. It’s not there. So, can anyony else help me? (Or you continue to allstar93).

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Stat Bonuses. (Nevermind, starting on a new source)

item.title: Changing Stat Bonuses. (Nevermind, starting on a new source)

u need to change it in item.cfg
